title: Online Science Learning Environment Design Utilizing Smart Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Concepts and Basic Smartphone Usage
context.additional_context: Personalized science learning design applying the 7Cs Framework in a smartphone-centered limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can design online science learning activities using the components of the 7Cs model (content, communication, collaboration, community, customization, context).
Learners can construct self-directed learning pathways using smartphone-based tools with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve learning activities at least twice by synthesizing peer feedback and instructor evaluations through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
